actions.description: The flameskull uses Fire Ray twice.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage.
actions.name: Fire Ray

traits.description: The flameskull sheds either dim light in a 15-foot radius, or bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. It can switch between the options as an action.
traits.name: Illumination

traits.description: The flameskull has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: If the flameskull is destroyed, it regains all its hit points in 1 hour unless holy water is sprinkled on its remains or a
traits.name: Rejuvenation

traits.description: The flameskull is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no somatic or material components to cast its spells. The flameskull has the following wizard spells prepared:
traits.name: Spellcasting
